item.title: AWS Account Creation Automation & Security
item.description: It’s been a busy couple of years so, as is usual, my blog was left to languish.

item.title: Traildash on ECS
item.description: I’ve recently had some issues where I’ve had to investigate the AWS API usage on one of our accounts.

item.title: CloudWatchr for AWS Instances
item.description: For some time I’ve been using Cloudwatch as a supplement to my other graphing and monitoring packages, but I finally got tired of the poor UI and lack of customisation.
